title: Expense Reimbursement Policy
text:
Expense Reimbursement Policy (v2.3)
Last updated: 2025-06-10

## Overview
Employees may submit business expenses through the Finance Portal.

## Deadlines
- Receipts must be submitted within 30 days of the expense date.
- Late submissions require Director approval. (See: Exceptions)

## Exceptions
If submitted after 30 days:
- 31–60 days: Director approval required
- 61–90 days: VP approval required
- >90 days: Not reimbursable

## Non-reimbursable
- Alcohol is not reimbursable.
- Personal items, fines, and subscriptions are not reimbursable.

## Notes
"Expense date" means the date on the receipt, not the date you enter it.

title: Expense Reimbursement Policy (old)
text:
Expense Reimbursement Policy (v1.8)  [OUTDATED]
Last updated: 2023-11-02

Deadlines:
- Submit receipts within 45 days.
- Late submissions need Manager approval.

Non-reimbursable:
- Alcohol: reimbursable only with client present (manager note required).

title: Expense Policy - copied section
text:
## Deadlines (duplicate paste)
Receipts must be submitted within 30 days of the expense date.
If submitted after 30 days, VP approval may be required depending on how late it is.

title: Travel Policy Quick Ref
text:
TRAVEL POLICY — quick ref
Updated 2025/04/02

1. Flights
- Economy required for flights under 6 hours.
- Premium economy allowed for 6–10 hours if booked 14+ days ahead.
- Business class allowed >10 hours with Director approval.

2) Hotels
Reasonable mid-range hotels. Avoid luxury unless conference rate.

3) Ride share
Airport rides are reimbursable up to $75 per trip. (See also: local limits)

title: Local travel limits - MI
text:
Local travel limits (Michigan)
Updated: 2022-08-19

Airport ride share limit: $60 per trip.
Note: this page is rarely updated.

title: SSO Access Runbook
text:
Single Sign-On (SSO) Access
Updated: 2025-09-01

To get SSO access:
- Request in AccessHub
- Choose app: Okta / GitHub / Jira
SLA: 1 business day for standard apps.

Escalation: #it-helpdesk for blocked logins.

title: Incident Response Playbook
text:
INCIDENT RESPONSE (IR) - Playbook
Last Updated: 2024-12-12

### Severity definitions
SEV1 = customer impact or data loss
SEV2 = degraded service
sev3 = internal-only issue

### First 10 minutes
- create incident channel
- assign IC + Comms
- post initial status within 10 minutes

## Post-incident
Write a postmortem within 5 business days.

title: VPN Reset
text: If VPN fails after password change, reboot and re-enroll your device.

title: Pager Duty
text: On-call rotations live in PagerDuty; swap by Thursday 5pm ET.

title: Password
text: Minimum 14 chars. No reuse for 24 cycles.

title: Slack Etiquette
text: Use threads. Tag @here only for SEV1.

title: PTO Policy
text:
### PTO Policy
PTO accrues monthly. Carryover cap: 40 hours.

title: PTO Policy (old)
text:
### PTO Policy (old)
Carryover cap: 80 hours (legacy for employees hired before 2021).

title: Expense Portal
text: Finance Portal URL: https://finance.example (internal).

title: Meal Reimbursement
text:
### Meal Reimbursement
Meals reimbursable during travel up to $55/day. Alcohol excluded.

title: Meal Reimbursement (snippet)
text:
### Meal Reimbursement (snippet)
Meals: $55/day (duplicate). Keep itemized receipt.

title: Laptop Purchase
text:
### Laptop Purchase
Standard laptop refresh every 3 years; exceptions require VP approval.

title: Laptop Purchase (faq)
text: Q: Can I buy a Mac? A: Only if your team approves and security signs off.
